title: Plains Animals
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: What animals might you see if you visit the plains? In Plains Animals, students will learn about some of the animals that live on the plains through the simple text and colorful illustrations, which help to support early emergent readers. As students read this story, they will have the opportunity to visualize, identify the setting of the story, and learn about nouns.
reviewWords: crocodile, elephant, giraffe, ostrich, plains, zebra
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
